posts.post_title: SGC 20 T206 Mordecai Brown Cubs on Shirt Piedmont 150/25
posts.post_content:
Looking to unload this T206 Mordecai Brown  to focus on other areas. The card was graded 20 Fair by SGC - please see the scans for the condition. Well centered on the front, but crease noted towards the bottom, slightly off centered on the back but overall a nice looking card of this HOF!

Looking $SOLD (net to me) dlvd OBO - please DM with questions. Thanks!

I’ll take it
